title: Karma border question
body: To get the karma border do i need to buy the skin and the ward or just the skin...(ik it also has to be before the 24th and it might not show up right away)

replies.body: As long as you purchase the skin **and** ward skin you should be getting that border. It doesn't matter if you got them through the bundle or separately, and if you don't have it then go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!

Hello Support,

This should answer your question here --> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/sIO2zmgI-conqueror-karma-border (see comment from MrGuessWho)
